# useList

Allows managing lists easily.

```typescript
function useList<T>(initialValues?: T[] | (() => T[])): [T[], ListManager<T>]
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                | Description |
| ------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| initialValues | `T[] ǀ (() => T[])` |             |

## Returns

`[T[], ListManager<T>]`
